data: Asghar Kayani Asghar Kayani Professor of Physics and Director, Particle Accelerator Lab (269) 387-4957 1133 Everett Tower, Mail Stop 5252 Kalamazoo MI 49008 USA Ph.D., Physics, Ohio Univeristy, 2003 M.Phil., Quaid-i-Azam University, Islamabad, Pakistan, 1994 Surfaces, interface and thin film analysis Properties and synthesis of nano structures/particles High and low energy ion-surface interactions Dr. Asghar Kayani is a professor of physics responsible for the tandem Van de Graaff Accelerator Laboratory in the Department of Physics at Western Michigan University. He is a condensed matter/surface science physicist with expertise in the science of advanced materials, nanoparticle synthesis and characterization, sustainable energy materials, manipulation of materials by ion beam irradiation, and thin films. Email Asghar Kayani
